Headline: 63rd-bound Green and  Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green and Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Ashland/Lake due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green and Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Ashland/Lake due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
